content:
bobogei81123 opened issue #6569:

The README in crates/wasi-preview1-component-adapter is outdated. It mentioned wasi_snapshot_preview1.wasm but there is none in the release page. There are only wasi_snapshot_preview1.command.wasm wasi_snapshot_preview1.reactor.wasm`. Could you clarify how to use these two WASM file?

fitzgen closed issue #6569:

The README in crates/wasi-preview1-component-adapter is outdated. It mentioned wasi_snapshot_preview1.wasm but there is none in the release page. There are only wasi_snapshot_preview1.command.wasm wasi_snapshot_preview1.reactor.wasm`. Could you clarify how to use these two WASM file?
